body: The mythic character is the child of a god, typically born from the union of that deity and a mortal. The moment of ascension is when the character learns of her true heritage or is visited by her divine parent (or an agent of that deity).
name: Godling
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Mythic Heroes/Creating a Mythic Character/Mythic Ascension/Godling
